DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free-text field to specify the type of test or evaluation for chimerism, the occurrence in an individual of two or more cell populations of different chromosomal constitutions derived from different individuals, as an evaluation for a transplant of healthy skin, bone, or other tissue taken from one part of the body and used to replace diseased or injured tissue removed from another part of the body, was performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to chimerism, the occurrence in an individual of two or more cell populations of different chromosomal constitutions derived from different individuals, as an evaluation for a healthy skin, bone, or other tissue taken from one part of the body and used to replace diseased or injured tissue removed from another part of the body.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Healthy skin, bone, or other tissue taken from one part of the body and used to replace diseased or injured tissue removed from another part of the body.

Concepts.definition: Tissue or organ transplanted from a donor to a recipient.

Property.preferredDefinition: The occurrence in an individual of two or more cell populations of different chromosomal constitutions, derived from different individuals. This contrasts with mosaicism in which the different cell populations are derived from a single individual.:Examination of the body by auscultation, palpation, percussion, inspection, and olfaction.  (Taber's)

Concepts.definition: The occurrence in an individual of two or more cell populations of different chromosomal constitutions, derived from different individuals. This contrasts with mosaicism in which the different cell populations are derived from a single individual.

A systemic evaluation of the body and its functions using visual inspection, palpation, percussion and auscultation. The purpose is to determine the presence or absence of physical signs of disease or abnormality for an individual's health assessment.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results or effects (does not include CTC Adverse Events) of therapeutic agents or procedures administered to the patient.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The free text field to specify the assessment performed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/23/17 jk added registration status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task; capitalized first word in definition. --- released
